name: Apollo
description: Apollo on a Cosmos LSDfi platform, designed to supercharge the yields on Liquid Staking Derivatives (LSDs). Apollo offers the highest yields for LSDs in Cosmos, starting with our flagship wstETH Vault on Neutron and following this with additional LSD vaults and our concentrated liquidity vaults on Osmosis. The Apollo token is the deflationary utility token for Apollo's LSDfi platform on Cosmos.
